text: Daniel Jacob Stern (born August 28, 1957) is an American television and movie actor. He has starred in movies with many genres, but is most known for his role as Marv Murchins in the 1990 film Home Alone and its 1992 sequel Home Alone 2: Lost in New York. Stern was born in Bethesda, Maryland. Stern is currently married to Laure Mattos since 1981, they have three children. ==Other websites== * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Maryland Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bethesda, Maryland
title: Daniel Stern
